messages.title: The Labour Local
messages.content: REPRESENTING PEOPLE LIKE US, ARE PEOPLE LIKE US

messages.title: Helping young and old
messages.content: YOUNG PEOPLE are our future. Under the Tories the cost of childcare has risen a shocking 30 percent. Labour will introduce a primary childcare guarantee, giving all parents of primary school children access to 8 a.m. to 6 p.m. wraparound childcare. - And for families with three and four-year-olds, 25 hours free nursery education will be provided per week when their parents are back to work. This alone could save your family over £2,500 a year.

messages.title: Save our NHS from Tory cuts
messages.content: Labour created the NHS, and now it is our job to save it again. Only Labour is committed to a long-term future for our beloved National Health Service...

messages.title: Bringing work and skills to Nottingham
messages.content: Under the Tories 1,250 local young people are long term unemployed. Labour will make sure our young people are able to develop and use their skills to build a successful future.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Introduction of a primary childcare guarantee and providing 25 hours of free nursery education per week.
Labour is committed to a long-term future for the National Health Service, proposing various reforms and investments.
Labour aims to tackle long term unemployment among young people in Nottingham, by ensuring opportunities for developing and utilizing their skills.

issues.economy: Labour aims to tackle long term unemployment and develop skills.
issues.education: Labour promises 25 hours of free nursery education for 3-4 year olds.
issues.health: Labour is dedicated to the long-term future of NHS, to prevent privatisation and cuts proposed by Tories.

leaflet.personalStatement: Graham Allen was born and bred in Nottingham North. Raised in Aspley went to local schools still lives in the constituency in Bulwell.

politicalExperience.achievements: Worked in textiles before becoming a Mother and serving the people of Nottingham North for over 26 years.

images.caption: Graham with local Labour councillors and your area
We all know someone helped by Graham
